thread.title: Rain hits several parts of UAE | GulfNews.com
thread.title_full: Rain hits several parts of UAE | GulfNews.com

author: Gulf News Web Report
title: Rain hits several parts of UAE | GulfNews.com
text:
LARGE 
Dubai: Light to moderate rain hit several parts of the UAE early Saturday following dusty overcast conditions the previous day. Heavy rain with thunder and lightning reported from in Abu Dhabi, Al Buteen and Khalifa A. Scattered rain fell on parts of Dubai late Friday night and early Saturday. Moderate to heavy rainfall reported in International City and Ras Al Khor area, while light to moderate rain reported from Jebel Ali, parts of Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Umm Al Quwain and Ras Al Khaima. 

Earlier, forecasters had warned of unstable weather on Friday and Saturday with partly cloudy to cloudy skies accompanied by scattered rainfall over different areas.
